title: Can I be part of female group where they backbite, have haram pictures etc - assim al hakeem
transcript: my question is can I be in an all-female study group on social media where the women have uncovered profile picture sometimes share Haram and bag bite if I don't engage in Haram is it okay as long as this is a study group and you don't Chit Chat and you don't go through their chit chat or social socializing and you don't post your picture and you limit it to your own benefits inshallah there is nothing Haram in that brother Muhammad
